meanings.definition: A person who creates visual representations or images.
meanings.sent1: The visualizers at the art studio painted a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent2: The graphic designer used visualizers to design the company logo.
meanings.sent3: The visualizers at the party drew funny caricatures of the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a visualizer, creating vivid scenes with every thought.
meanings.sent5: The visualizers in the movie made the special effects look incredibly realistic.

meanings.definition: A device or software used to create visual representations or images.
meanings.sent1: The classroom had interactive visualizers for the students to use.
meanings.sent2: The photographer used a high-quality visualizer to edit his photos.
meanings.sent3: The visualizer glitched and turned all the images upside down.
meanings.sent4: The visualizer transformed the plain room into a virtual wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The new visualizer software allowed for more detailed 3D modeling.
